name: 9th International KES Conference on INTELLIGENT INTERACTIVE MULTIMEDIA: SYSTEMS AND SERVICES
content: CONFERENCE SCOPE ------------------------------ The 9th International Conference on Intelligent Interactive Multimedia Systems and Services - IIMSS-16 is an international scientific symposium for research in the fields of intelligent interactive multimedia systems and services. Full list of conference topics: http://iimss-16.kesinternational.org/scope.php VENUE ---------- Luxury 5\* Hotel Botanico & The Oriental Spa Garden, Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife, Spain http://hotelbotanico.com/en IMPORTANT DATES --------------------------- \* General Track \* Submission Deadline: February 1, 2016 Notification of acceptance: February 22, 2016 Upload Final Publication Files: March 14, 2016 \* Invited Sessions \* Submission Deadline: Session Chair Sets Deadline A List of Invited Sessions being organised can be seen here: http://iimss-16.kesinternational.org/cmsISdisplay.php CONFERENCE PROCEEDINGS ----------------------------------------- All accepted papers will be published by Springer in the conference proceedings as book chapter in a volume of the KES Smart Innovation Systems and Technologies series, referenced in Scopus, Thomson-Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index (CPCI) and ISI Web of Science. CONTACTS ---------------- Giuseppe Caggianese IIMSS-16 Publicity Chair National Research Council of Italy giuseppe.caggianese@na.icar.cnr.it
